channel.title: Village General (new threads)
channel.description: Threads in the forum category "Village General" - General Discussions Related to the Village

item.title: The Fallen Vilage - About to do The Impossible
item.description: Auto-accept turned on, just need to fill up to do the Impossible Mission
item.content:encoded:
We now have everything we need to do the Impossible Mission - except 50 villagers. Join now to beat the rush to get Survived the Impossible.

We have all Tier Two upgrades, including ROOT and Pizzawitch, and have regular Kaiju fights while we wait to fill up.

We also hold a daily raffle between all villagers who patrolled the previous day, for a first prize of 10RP and a second prize of 2 TACOs.

item.title: Villages about to be Immortalized
item.description: If your village is about to blow up, post it here!
item.content:encoded: Besides hoping to STI myself, it seems like this thread would just be a useful tool in general for many players who visit the forum

item.title: join Omerta village they are doing impossible mission
any1 doing The Impossible Mission?
item.content:encoded: looking to join a village doing or planning to do The Impossible Mission

item.title: Need Vice-Kage
item.content:encoded: This might belong in the recruiting forum but I'm not sure so, as the title suggests I need a strong vice kage in my village even a strong alt will do. We currently have 25 villagers and 69 upgrades so if you're interested post here or pm me.

item.title: Shady Dealings lvl 3
item.content:encoded:
Hopefully someone can answer my question. Does shady dealings lvl 3 stack within a village? E.g., if 2 villagers have shady dealings lvl 3 then the cost for the Burgerninja upgrade would be 1 of each basic resource and 1 advanced resource. Or, does shady dealings lvl 3 only pertain to the person who has it and is not village wide?

Thanks in advance for any help!

and what is peace/how do you get it?

item.title: Trainers
item.content:encoded:
I may not be a Kage (…wait, in BvS wasn't it changed to Cage for "teh luls"? I'm not sure why everyone else still says "Kage" when meaning in BvS…)
but I was looking through the village pages.
What is the "trainers" section? How does a village get them, what do they do, are they not actually in BvS just something the Cages put in their pages for fun?
Give me some help here please ^^

item.title: Join Lucky Village, Impossible Mission is in our future
item.description: I am Jesus kage of Lucky village, join Lucky village!
item.content:encoded: yea Im Jesus the kage of Lucky Village and anybody can join, I have all three sannin themes and plan on completing the impossible mission once our village gets 50 members and all upgrades and those spirits. Once we start summoning kaiju I will be giving away many monster drops, also I am a very strong season 3 kage ready to crush other villages.

item.title: Storehouse Items
item.content:encoded:
Please use this thread for requesting permanent items that are currently in our storehouse. You are also free to arrange trades on your own.

The following items may be requested if they end up in the store house.

  • Chakra Armor
  • Codec
  • K-Dog's Headband
  • Love Love Paradise
  • Necklace of the First HoCage
  • Ninja Dog
  • Ninja Puppet
  • Giant Fan
  • Stealth Suit
  • Trench Nife

The following items can not be requested. These are all monster drops. In the event that I am able to distribute one of these, it will probably go to the person who contributed most to the killing of a monster (assuming they don't already have that item).

  • Bear Coat
  • Book of Spoilers
  • Carapace Armor
  • Clow Card
  • Fruit Basket
  • Go Piece
  • Granola Camouflage
  • Groupies
  • Late-Night Snack
  • Magical Wand
  • Money Printer
  • Monkey Cymbals
  • Perfect Hair
  • Persocom
  • Plug Suit
  • Pokeballs
  • Polar Star
  • Power over 9000
  • Red Water
  • Regalia
  • Shiny Belt
  • Spirit of the Demon of the Sand
  • Troll Account
  • Vampire Cloak

Once a request has been fulfilled, I'll delete the post to keep this thread relatively clear and uncluttered.

item.title: IMPORTANT: Read or you may get kicked from the Village
item.description: Do not have more than 1 character from the same IP in the Village.
item.content:encoded:
Okay, we're really starting to have a problem with this.

Do not bring more than one character from the same IP into the Village. If you do, all of the characters from that IP are going to be kicked out.

It's seriously starting to hurt our Village, and it's really starting to bother me.

Only one (1) character from an IP address can help the Village out (by providing ryo, collecting for resources, patrolling, etc), but all of the characters from that IP address increase the Village size and upkeep cost (this makes it harder for us to collect resources and to defend the Village).

This means that you can't play one character and an alt both in the Wiki Village. This also means that if your friends play BvS from over at your house, they can't be in the Village either. I'm sorry, but this is the way the game has been designed. It's intended to discourage cheating, and it's in the game rules and has been for some time.

I'm sorry this is the way it needs to be, but we can't have 4 people in the Village who are complete dead weight. And if I don't do something about it now, it's going to get worse as time progresses.

item.title: Welcome!
item.content:encoded:
Greetings!

This forum is intended to be utilized primarily by members of "Wiki Redux" in Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN. This will provide us with a place to discuss our own particular village strategy and goals as well as plan out future upgrades.

So please, come on in and join us in the hunt for more information!

Update: The Village has a good 40 or so people in it right now, but there's plenty of room for expansion, so don't be shy if you need a Village!
